subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After racing to a 5-0 lead in three innings, the Mets failed to notch another hit until the ninth, and a sub-par J.J. Putz blew open a door he was brought in to close, again.
snippet: After racing to a 5-0 lead in three innings, the Mets failed to notch another hit until the ninth, and a sub-par J.J. Putz blew open a door he was brought in to close, again.
